languages.text: "Исключено. Даже не принимая в расчет потенциальную потерю данных... это смертельно опасно".

traits.locale_text: "Исключено. Даже не принимая в расчет потенциальную потерю данных... это смертельно опасно".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Out of the question. Even if we disregard the potential loss of data... It could kill us."
languages.original_text: "Исключено. Даже не принимая в расчет потенциальную потерю данных... это смертельно опасно".

traits.locale_text: "Out of the question. Even if we disregard the potential loss of data... It could kill us."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Out of the question. Even if we disregard the potential loss of data... It could kill us."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Out of the question. Even if we disregard the potential loss of data... It could kill us."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Out of the question. Even if we disregard the potential loss of data... It could kill us."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “想都别想，就算不考虑数据方面的潜在损失……这么做可能会害死我们。”
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. Even if we disregard the potential loss of data... It could kill us."

traits.locale_text: “想都别想，就算不考虑数据方面的潜在损失……这么做可能会害死我们。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Imposible. Aun ignorando la posible pérdida de datos... podría matarnos».
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. Even if we disregard the potential loss of data... It could kill us."

traits.locale_text: «Imposible. Aun ignorando la posible pérdida de datos... podría matarnos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「問題外です。データ損失の可能性を無視したとしても…我々の方が死ぬかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. Even if we disregard the potential loss of data... It could kill us."

traits.locale_text: 「問題外です。データ損失の可能性を無視したとしても…我々の方が死ぬかもしれません」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Kommt nicht infrage. Selbst wenn wir den potenziellen Datenverlust vernachlässigen ... könnte uns das umbringen."
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. Even if we disregard the potential loss of data... It could kill us."

traits.locale_text: "Kommt nicht infrage. Selbst wenn wir den potenziellen Datenverlust vernachlässigen ... könnte uns das umbringen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Il n'en est pas question. Si la perte potentielle de données n'était pas une raison suffisante... cela pourrait aussi nous tuer. »
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. Even if we disregard the potential loss of data... It could kill us."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'en est pas question. Si la perte potentielle de données n'était pas une raison suffisante... cela pourrait aussi nous tuer. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Olmaz. Veri kaybını göz ardı etsek dahi... Ölümümüze yol açabilir."
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. Even if we disregard the potential loss of data... It could kill us."

traits.locale_text: “Olmaz. Veri kaybını gözardı etsek dahi... Ölümümüze yol açabilir.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
